fields.description:
We're currently lacking the command lines for these api:

DescribeLoadBalancerAttributes
ModifyLoadBalancerAttributes

The support is pre-requisite to allow users to manage LB's connections (idle time, draining). The server-side is implemented already.

comments.body: [~gholms] Do you want to take this? This is a blocker for 4.2, but I can't set the fix version # so.
[~gholms] Any plan on this? This is a blocker for 4.2.

Commit {{e6d2af7}} adds two new commands:

h5. eulb-describe-load-balancer-attributes _ELB_
This command shows load balancer attributes as a list of dotted attribute/value pairs.
{code}
% eulb-describe-lb-attributes my-lb
AccessLog.Enabled	false
ConnectionDraining.Enabled	false
ConnectionDraining.Timeout	600
ConnectionSettings.IdleTimeout	60
CrossZoneLoadBalancing.Enabled	true
{code}

h5. eulb-modify-lb-attributes _ELB_ _ATTR=VAL_ ...
This command takes dotted attribute value pairs in much the same format as eulb-describe-lb-attributes outputs.  Supplying more than one attribute in the same command will update them transactionally.
{code}% eulb-modify-lb-attributes my-lb ConnectionDraining.Enabled=true ConnectionDraining.Timeout=600{code}

Fix Verified.
Describe and modify lb attributes is working.

Installed Packages
Name        : euca2ools
Arch        : noarch
Version     : 3.2.1
Release     : 0.0.1720.38.20150728gite439ce8.el6

{code}
[root@c-32 ~]# euca-version
euca2ools 3.2.1-43-ge439ce8 (Yokohama)
eucalyptus 4.2.0
{code}

example of describe and modify
{code}
[root@c-32 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --show-long
LOAD_BALANCER	vpc-elb	internal-vpc-elb-000412106139.lb.e-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=30,target=TCP:80,timeout=5,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=2}	one	subnet-84544b30	vpc-45396025		{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-port=80}					{owner-alias=000412106139,group-name=default}	{sg-650e0282}	2015-07-30T22:04:51.658Z	internal

[root@c-32 ~]# eulb-describe-lb-attributes vpc-elb
AccessLog.Enabled	false
ConnectionDraining.Enabled	false
ConnectionSettings.IdleTimeout	60
CrossZoneLoadBalancing.Enabled	false

[root@c-32 ~]# eulb-modify-lb-attributes vpc-elb CrossZoneLoadBalancing.Enabled=true

[root@c-32 ~]# eulb-describe-lb-attributes vpc-elb
AccessLog.Enabled	false
ConnectionDraining.Enabled	false
ConnectionSettings.IdleTimeout	60
CrossZoneLoadBalancing.Enabled	true
{code}

Reopening this issue due to the fact that eulb-modify-lb-attributes fails to enable access logging: {code} [root@c-02 ~]# eulb-modify-lb-attributes NginxLoadBalancers AccessLog.Enabled=True S3BucketName=nginx-access-logs EmitInterval=5 S3BucketPrefix=nginx --region devops-admin@region-1 eulb-modify-lb-attributes: error (InternalFailure): Failed to modify attributes: Invalid bucket name specified [root@c-02 ~]# eulb-modify-lb-attributes NginxLoadBalancers AccessLog.Enabled=True S3BucketName=s3://nginx-access-logs EmitInterval=5 S3BucketPrefix=nginx --region devops-admin@region-1 eulb-modify-lb-attributes: error (InternalFailure): Failed to modify attributes: Invalid bucket name specified {code} In addition, there wasn't any information in the {{--help}} option to clear up any confusion: {code} [root@c-02 ~]# eulb-modify-lb-attributes NginxLoadBalancers --help usage: eulb-modify-lb-attributes [-U URL] [--region USER@REGION] [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--security-token TOKEN] [--debug] [--debugger] [--version] [-h] ELB ATTR=VALUE [ATTR=VALUE ...] Modify a load balancer's attributes positional arguments: ELB the load balancer to describe (required) ATTR=VALUE name and new value of each attribute to modify (required) optional arguments: -U URL, --url URL load balancing service endpoint URL --region USER@REGION region and/or user names to search when looking up config file data -I KEY_ID, --access-key-id KEY_ID -S KEY, --secret-key KEY --security-token TOKEN --debug show debugging output --debugger launch interactive debugger on error --version show the program's version and exit -h, --help show this help message and exit {code} Additional debug messages: {code} [root@c-02 ~]# eulb-modify-lb-attributes NginxLoadBalancers AccessLog.Enabled=True S3BucketName=nginx-access-logs EmitInterval=5 S3BucketPrefix=nginx --region devops-admin@region-1 --debug 2015-09-22 19:12:43,078 DEBUG ModifyLoadBalancerAttributes parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'region': 'devops-admin@region-1', 'attrs': [{'AccessLog.Enabled': 'True'}, {'S3BucketName': 'nginx-access-logs'}, {'EmitInterval': '5'}, {'S3BucketPrefix': instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" NginxLoadBalancers --region devops-admin@region-1 {code} # Downloaded s3cmd from Github, and created configuration file using 'devops/admin' credentials. # {code} # Added write access ACL for '(eucalyptus)loadbalancing' account to bucket: {code} [root@c-02 ~]# euare-accountlist --region cloud-admin@region-1 (eucalyptus)imaging 000647791497 (eucalyptus)aws-exec-read 000987058328 eucalyptus 000466351755 (eucalyptus)database 000892121492 (eucalyptus)objectstorage 000007610758 (eucalyptus)cloudformation 000925368683 devops 000693176866 setacl s3://nginx-access-logs s3://nginx-access-logs/: ACL updated {code} # Attempted to enable access logging using 'eulb-modify-lb-attributes': {code} [root@c-02 ~]# eulb-modify-lb-attributes NginxLoadBalancers AccessLog.Enabled=True S3BucketName=nginx-access-logs EmitInterval=5 S3BucketPrefix=nginx --region devops-admin@region-1 eulb-modify-lb-attributes: error (InternalFailure): Failed to modify attributes: Invalid bucket name specified {code}

Approved for release.  The issue isn't that 'eulb-modify-lb-attributes' doesn't work.  I was able to enable access log by running the following command:
{code}
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-modify-lb-attributes NginxLoadBalancers AccessLog.Enabled=True AccessLog.S3BucketName=nginx-access-logs AccessLog.EmitInterval=5 AccessLog.S3BucketPrefix=nginx --region devops-admin@region-1
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lb-attributes NginxLoadBalancers --region devops-admin@region-1
AccessLog.EmitInterval	5
AccessLog.Enabled	true
AccessLog.S3BucketName	nginx-access-logs
AccessLog.S3BucketPrefix	nginx
ConnectionDraining.Enabled	false
ConnectionSettings.IdleTimeout	60
CrossZoneLoadBalancing.Enabled	false
{code}
The issue is that the attributes were not displayed; therefore knowing what the correct attributes to pass to 'eulb-modify-lb-attributes' was not apparent.  After comparing the wire communication between euca2ools and AWS CLI (which succeeded), this became apparent.  I will raise another ticket to address this issue.
